page.title: 05THE TOWN CENTRE,TELFORD
page.content: {Phase 1}of{Telford Shopping Centre}was opened in Autumn 1973.The main traders being{Carrefour and Sainsbury's. Phase {2}was officially opened by{Her Majesty {the Queen}on 13th November,1981.The Centre covers over 600,000 sq ft.There is space for 3,500 cars to park around the Centre.{Phase 2}includes two main {'Display Areas',Piccadilly Square and {Beehive Square}which are used for various activities during the year. Today at the{Town Centre}there are{13{ {ladies}clothes shops,{2 toy}shops ,{1 {flower}shop,{2 newsagents,6 electrical goods shops,{2 wallpaper}shops,{1 book shop,{1 furniture}store,{2 department stores,{1 car}accessory{shop,1 bakers, {1 sports}shop,{1 greengrocer,1 D.I.Y,1 {Supermarket, 5 shoe}shops,{2 chemists, {2 mens}clothes shops,{3 travel}agents, {4 jewellers, 1 gift}shop,{1 pet shop,1 {wine shop,Computer Village,1 Hypermart
